FROM debian:9

RUN apt-get update -y && \
    apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y wget \
                   curl \
                   python \
                   git && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

RUN curl -f https://cloud-pipeline-oss-builds.s3.amazonaws.com/tools/pip/2.7/get-pip.py | python -
